text:
Hey guys, just a quick double check, I can't see the parameter for image url (not src) in the dev docs. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags>

I assume the optional link is {{ widget_data.module_name.url }}?

<@U7V9DQ31P> Is the breadcrumb feature of the advanced menu not a viable option for this project?

I have not used the menu function for this in the past.
No I needed to create schema json markup
Thought I could loop through them with that function but ended up just manually parsing the URL itself since it wasn't working
